body_html: This is strange: usually it'd start at the latest checkpoint. It's all saved in the --train_dir directory and the "checkpoint" file there specifies what's the latest checkpoint. Could it be that you used /tmp and your checkpoint got deleted, e.g., on restart?
body_text: This is strange: usually it'd start at the latest checkpoint. It's all saved in the --train_dir directory and the "checkpoint" file there specifies what's the latest checkpoint. Could it be that you used /tmp and your checkpoint got deleted, e.g., on restart?
body: This is strange: usually it'd start at the latest checkpoint. It's all saved in the --train_dir directory and the "checkpoint" file there specifies what's the latest checkpoint. Could it be that you used /tmp and your checkpoint got deleted, e.g., on restart?
